Space Miners Dream Drop

Relax Gaming

We have lift-off! Blast through the night sky and crash into space to win up to 50,000x.

Space Miners is back with a dazzling Dream Drop facelift with 1,000,000 ways to win to help take the game out of this world.

Keep your eyes peeled for the random jackpot counter to trigger the Bonus drop inside the jackpot meter and increase your win potential with RAPID, MIDI, MAXI, MAJOR and MEGA jackpots ready to land on the reels.

There’s no need to dig deep to trigger Free Spins either! Collect 3 Bonus symbols in the main game to unlock six spins - ready to unearth some wins out of this world?
